title: Can you share unique facts worth 150k upvotes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Dogs can learn up to 250 words and gestures.  40 million years ago penguins were 6 feet tall.  25% of all mammal species on Earth are bats.  Jellyfish are 95% water.  The pH scale was invented by the Carlsberg brewery.  Most perfume is made from Sperm Whale puke.  In the Californian White Mountains, there are trees older than history.  The Hawaiian flag purposefully looks like a combination of the British and American flags.  NASA’s internet speed is 91 GB per second!  For their first month of living, babies only see in black & white.  Malta has never experienced weather below freezing point.  The letter “A” doesn’t appear in a written number until you reach One Thousand.  Banging your head against a wall for one hour burns 150 calories.  So far, two diseases have successfully been eradicated: smallpox and rinderpest.  😁✌
